entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 March 2023
